image_meta.caption: AL TUFFAH (---), 13/12/2025.- Internally displaced Palestinian shelter in a destroyed building, in Al Tuffah neighbourhood, east of Gaza City, 13 December 2025, near the yellow line amid a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. Around 1.9 million people in Gaza, nearly 90 percent of the population, have been displaced since the Israel-Hamas conflict began in October 2023, according to the UN. EFE/EPA/MOHAMMED SABER

image_meta.caption: SYDNEY (Australia), 15/12/2025.- Mourners place flowers at a memorial at Bondi Beach in Sydney, Australia, 15 December 2025. Australia is in mourning after gunmen opened fire on Bondi Beach, killing at least 15 people in an attack against the Jewish community's Hanukkah festival celebrations, on 14 December. One of the alleged gunmen was also killed during the incident. EFE/EPA/BIANCA DE MARCHI AUSTRALIA AND NEW ZEALAND OUT
